data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Ar Rayyan, Qatar need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ar Rayyan, Qatar
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Ar Rayyan, Qatar who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Ar Rayyan, Qatar that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Ar Rayyan
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, help the 5,009 believers in Ar Rayyan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 120 neighbors who are far from you in Ar Rayyan. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Ar Rayyan, Qatar to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ar Rayyan, Qatar has a population of 605,700.

We estimate Ar Rayyan has 5,009 people who might know Jesus, 32,515 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 568,176 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 120 neighbors who need Jesus.
